levelList.name: Lacrime del Sangue Immondo - La Fine [終]
levelList.desc:
This Skill does not consume E.G.O Resources
[CantDuel]
Deal +2% damage for every [DragonLance] on self (max 6%)
Deal +4% damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self (max 20%)
[WhenUse] If main target has 5+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At 3+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +1 and Base Power +1
[EndSkill] Remove [DragonLance] and [CondensedBlood] from self, then dies

levelList.name: Lacrime del Sangue Immondo - La Fine [終]
levelList.desc:

Deal <style="highlight">+6%</style> damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self (max <style="highlight">30%</style>)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Burst] on main target (max 2)</style>
[WhenUse] At 3+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +1 and Base Power +1
<style="highlight">- At 4+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +2 and Base Power +2 instead</style>
[EndSkill] Remove [DragonLance] and [CondensedBlood] from self, then dies

levelList.name: To Remain Oneself [宁作吾]
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Breath]
[BeforeAttack] At 5+ ([Breath] Potency + [Breath] Count), Final Power +1
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has [Cianjing], deal +15% damage
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has [SeniorCianjing], deal +27% damage
[EndSkill] Gain 5 [Cianjing]
- If this unit has [Cianjing] or [SeniorCianjing], consume all of it and gain 5 [SeniorCianjing]

coindescs.desc: If this unit has [Cianjing], deal +([Breath] Potency / 2)% damage on Critical Hit (max 15%)
If this unit has [SeniorCianjing], deal +(([Breath] Potency + [Breath] Count) / 2)% damage on Critical Hit (max 30%)
